                 Rosenthal Pavilion                       Colloquium Room                       Grand Hall                       C95 Lecture Hall                                                                   Eisner & Lubin Auditorium                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       Eisner & Lubin auditorium can accommodate over 400 with row seating, and is ideal for lectures, presentations, panel discussions, and performances. With a clear floor, the space features 6,000 square feet of polished cherrywood, suitable for fairs, seated and standing receptions, and much more.      E&L has modern HD projector with a 20x20 projection screen, surround sound, and a sophisticated lighting system designed with both theatrical and LED instruments.                         6,650 sq ft   432 row seating   64 conference   250 banquet                           Inquiry Form                                For reference, view a floor plan of the Kimmel Center’s fourth floor.
